4.3 DUIM-DCs Module

pen?

Generic function

Summary

Returns #t if its argument is a pen.

Signature

pen? object => boolean

Arguments

object
An instance of type <object>.

Values

boolean
An instance of type <boolean>.

Library

duim-dcs

Module

duim-dcs

Description

Returns #t if object is a pen, otherwise returns #f.

See also

<pen>, page 174

pen-cap-shape, page 176

pen-dashes, page 177

pen-joint-shape, page 178

pen-units, page 179

pen-width, page 180

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
